attributes.action: announce a new bank holiday, on the same par as Easter Monday and Christmas day, were nobody is allowed to trade.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As one of the many retail workers of this country, we have to work 363 days a year, whilst other workers have all bank holidays off.
 I would like a new bank holiday which does not allow trading to take place so that retail workers can have an extra day off.
